Hello Nelson,

There’s something you need to know because Omena is not an ordinary hotel:

1. Omena has no reception, so you can go straight to your room.

2. Your door code is the key to your room.

3. To get your door code and room number, you need to check-in online.

4. Check-in is open, do it now!

Sleep well,

Team Omena Hotels

kw.name: Wait for Latest Booking Confirmation
kw.msg:
Return: '
Your booking number:
543588488

Now let's check in!

Nelson
Arrival Departure
4 PM Oct 10 2023 12 noon Oct 12 2023
CHECK-IN

Hello Nelson,

There’s something you need to know because Omena is not an ordinary hotel:

1. Omena has no reception, so you can go straight to your room.

2. Your door code is the key to your room.

3. To get your door code and room number, you need to check-in online.

4. Check-in is open, do it now!

Sleep well,

Team Omena Hotels

Full Omena experience

2 more hours of sleep?
Check if early arrival or late departure is available to you. Or perhaps you want to add breakfast or extend your stay with a full day. Changes to the booking can be made by clicking below.
ADD EXTRA TIME
Good morning!
Did you book your breakfast?
If you added breakfast to your booking, present your booking confirmation at Wilhelmiinan Konditoria. The address is Asemakatu 6. It is not too late to add breakfast to your booking, just click below.
BUY BREAKFAST HERE
Download our app!
The app makes booking and your stay at Omena Hotels more convenient.
Find your Hotel on a map
Omena Hotel Jyväskylä Vapaudenkatu 57

At Omena Hotels the doors open with personal door codes, and for the delivery of said codes requires the e-mail addresses and phone numbers of the guests.
